text: niyata vasayenma kavurun rju margaya meya yayi taman tula pæhædili vu pasuvada, (eya) pratiksepa kara dama, allahge margaya (an ayata) valakva lamin (allahge) dutayata viruddhava katayutu karannoda, ovun (emagin) niyata vasayenma allahta kisima haniyak kara hærimata nohækiya. ovunge (kumantrana vana) væda katayutu (siyalla) niyata vasayenma allah vinasa kara damanu æta
